keywords.indexterm: Quick Start Guide for Content Author

body.p: This Quick Start Guide is meant to help the Content Author get started using as quickly as possible.

ol.li: [Prerequisite] Before using Oxygen Content Fusion, your system administrator will first need to set up and configure your Enterprise server and theserver address needs to be configured.
Click the Show Content Fusion Task Manager toolbar button (or go to Window Show View Content Fusion Tasks Manager ) to open the Content Fusion Task Manager view.
Create a task, add documents, and upload the task to the server.
Share the task link with Reviewers.
Once the Reviewers are finished, pull the changes and use the built-in Merge tool to integrate the changes back into Oxygen XML Editor or Oxygen XML Author.

body.p: Result: The Content Author can now continue to work with the documents with the suggested changes merged into the content. For example, they could accept or reject the suggested changes, continue to edit the documents, and then commit the changes to their particular repository.
